column4: is there a PHP version with CURL already enabled? if so, what package name is it, and in what repo. Been looking around as needed
and it's not all good, but remember to exit when you are done
most people go by "sudo <root_command>
instead of being su'd all the time
no one ever does it, it's not how the ubuntu design works
sudo rm foldername
my laptop uses vista...

the only thing is, i don't want to be treated like i'm ten, when i'm 23 years old
